detail_desc: Long-sleeved top in stretch viscose jersey with a wide neckline and rounded hem.
Satin top with lace, super-skinny, adjustable shoulder straps and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Trousers in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Top in cotton sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Velour-covered hair elastic.

Calf-length jumpsuit in crinkled jersey with a V-neck and wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the top. Gently dropped shoulders, short sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets. Straight, wide legs.
Fully lined swimsuits with an all-over print, narrow shoulder straps and decorative gathers at the top.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey.
Smartphone case in pearly plastic.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and a motif.
Low strappy sandals in leather with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle, insoles and soles in rubber.
Jumper in a soft, jacquard knit containing some wool with a ribbed stand-up neck, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in softly draping, slightly stretchy cotton twill. Regular waist with adjustable elastication, a zip fly and button, side pockets, fake welt back pockets and slim legs.
Short, fitted, sleeveless dress in ribbed cotton jersey with a V-neck front and back and shoulder straps with a bow on top.
Long-sleeved body in chiffon with a V-neck and wrapover with a concealed fastening at the front. Seam at the waist below which is a jersey section with a lined gusset and press-studs at the crotch.
Fine-knit gloves in a soft wool blend with a decorative bow in imitation leather on the top.
Trainers in multicoloured imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue and lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles and chunky, patterned soles.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a decorative bow and scalloped trim at the top, and press-studs at the crotch.
Block-patterned T-shirt in jersey made from a cotton blend.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back.

Platform sandals in imitation suede with imitation cork wedge heels, an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and open toes. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform 2.5 cm, heel approx. 10cm.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist and straight legs.
Bolero in soft, fine-knit cotton with a faceted sparkly button at the top and long sleeves.
Double-layered sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back.
Suit trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight, slightly wider legs.

Sleeveless playsuit in an airy, textured weave with narrow shoulder straps, a V-neck, buttons down the front and a concealed zip in one side. Cut-out section at the back with a twisted detail at the top and elastication at the back of the waist. Jersey-lined bottom section.
Jacquard-knit socks in various colours and designs.
Maxi skirt in a patterned viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim, and gathered seams for width. Lined at the top.
Jacket in soft faux fur with hook-and-eye fasteners at the front and side pockets. Lined.
Long-sleeved dress in jersey with a supersoft, brushed finish. Small embroidered detail at the top and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative, twisted cord bow and tassels.
Shorter jumper knitted in a cotton blend with some textured-knit sections. Small stand-up collar with a roll edge, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Trousers in a woven wool blend with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, jetted back pockets and straight legs with creases.
Socks in a patterned chenille knit with ear-shaped appliqués.
Shopper in grained imitation leather with imitation suede inside and two handles at the top. Unlined. Size 16x28x38 cm.
Cotton jersey boxer briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Court shoes with pointed toes. Jersey linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Straight-cut T-shirt in soft cotton jersey in a relaxed style with an open chest pocket and short slits in the sides.

Knee-length padded parka in woven fabric. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front and a pile-lined hood with a detachable faux fur trim. One zipped chest pocket, flap side pockets with a press-stud, and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Adjustable tab and press-stud at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Quilted lining.
Cardigan in soft sweatshirt fabric with a shawl collar, buttons down the front and fake front pockets. Wide foldover ribbing at the cuffs and a ribbed hem. Soft brushed inside.
Leggings in a stretch cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Super skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
A pair of hoop earrings and a pair of round stud earrings in gold-plated metal. Diameter of studs approx. 0.5 cm, Diameter of hoops approx. 2.8 cm.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a V-neck and long sleeves. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Tights in a fine knit containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist. Soft inside.
Sandals with narrow straps at the front, a heel strap and fluted soles.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, stretchy cotton jersey in various designs.

Fully lined, super push-up bikini top with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Extra crossover strap with an adjustable metal fastener at the back, ties at the back of the neck and an adjustable metal fastener at the back.
Calf-length trousers in an airy linen and cotton weave. Regular waist with covered elastication and a drawstring, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Derby shoes with lacing at the front, a welt seam around the soles and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 2 cm.
Cold shoulder top in a soft viscose weave with an elasticated flounce that goes across the shoulders and an opening and button at the back of the neck.
Swim shorts in a patterned weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and short legs with slits in the sides. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Tights in a soft, cable-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Tights in a fine knit containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist.
Cropped, short-sleeved sports top designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cotton jersey briefs.
Short top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a viscose blend with long sleeves.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted, off-the-shoulder dress in jersey with short sleeves.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details. Regular waist, a zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbed cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Poncho in an airy weave with a decorated hem.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Fully lined swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and two layers of scalloped flounces at the waist.
Straight-style joggers in stretch, supersoft denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front and back pockets, fake fly and legs with decorative seams at the knees and narrow hems.

Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a V-neck and buttons at the back. Mesh bodice covered in floral appliqués, a seam at the waist and a double-layered skirt in glittery tulle. Underskirt with a mesh flounce at the hem for added width. Lined.
Textured-knit tights with an elasticated waist.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Made using Lycra® Lastingfit technology to retain the shape of the jeans for a consistent fit.
Metal earrings, one with a shell. Length 2 cm and 4 cm.
Sports trousers with an elasticated waist, side pockets and tapered legs with contrasting colour panels down the sides and ribbed hems.
Sandals with an adjustable strap around the heel. Imitation suede insoles and rubber soles.

Sweatshirt made from a cotton blend with a front section in a broderie anglaise cotton weave with frills. Dropped shoulders, long puff sleeves with narrow ribbing at the cuffs, and ribbing at the hem.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with a print motif on the front and a round neck front and back with decorative crossover straps at the back. Rounded, slightly longer back.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a round neckline and a print motif.
Short dress in a viscose weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.

Playsuit in a soft patterned viscose weave with a small stand-up collar and fasteners at the top. Side pockets and an elasticated seam at the waist with a decorative bow and tassels. Short sleeves and short legs.

Studio Collection. Short, boxy-style jumper in a chunky-knit alpaca and wool blend with a round neckline overlayered with a pointed, ribbed collar. Dropped shoulders, extra-long sleeves with wide ribbing at the cuffs, and a roll-edge hem. Studio Collection AW20 is a tribute to the rebellious, fearless individual who dares to break the mould – an individual who plays between the extremes and finds their style amongst the androgynous, eclectic and creative.
